description:
My place is close to La Marina, Yummy Thai, Piper's Kilt, Inwood Local, and Darling Coffee. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the outdoors space, the comfy bed, the light, and the kitchen. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Our Cool and Cozy Apartment, Has A Bright Homely Feeling, Home Away From Home .Centrally Located On A Quiet Street, Very Residential, Just One Block Away From The Train. All Amenities Included, Lots Of Towels And Linen.

This is an entire apartment. Guest will have access to the entire apartment.

My place is close to La Marina, Yummy Thai, Piper's Kilt, Inwood Local, and Darling Coffee. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the outdoors space, the comfy bed, the light, and the kitchen. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). Very safe neighborhood conveniently located, 24 Laundromat around the block, 24 Pharmacy, 24 Supermarket Plenty of Restaurants, Chinese take open till 11pm.

The apartment is located along the bus lines & I'm also centrally located A Express & local train. Train is 1/2 block away.

Emergencies do happen and always need a back up plan in the event. Absolutely no parties! Only guest who are apart of the reservation is allowed to be on premises. Please do not throw away any bowls, plates, pots, glasses/cups or silverware. If you lose the keys there will be a $150 key replacement charge.
name: Perfect Manhattan Vacation
review: The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
